list.stitle: Facilitated by Frances Madden (BL) from the Heritage PIDs Project
list.comment: The slides for the welcome are available [here|https://github.com/tanc-ahrc/IIIF-TNC/blob/master/docs/files/PIDs%20in%20IIIF%20Webinar%20-%20Introduction.pdf]. Three of our panelists also created slides for their presentations: Rachael Kotarski's slides are available [here|https://github.com/tanc-ahrc/IIIF-TNC/blob/master/docs/files/PIDs%20in%20IIIF%20Webinar%20-%20Introduction%20-%20Kotarski.pdf], Joe Padfield's are available[here|https://github.com/tanc-ahrc/IIIF-TNC/blob/master/docs/files/PIDs%20in%20IIIF%20Webinar%20-%20Introduction%20-%20Padfield.pdf ], and Julien Raemy's are available [here|https://github.com/tanc-ahrc/IIIF-TNC/blob/master/docs/files/PIDs%20in%20IIIF%20Webinar%20-%20Introduction%20-%20Raemy.pdf].

list.stitle: Facilitated by Anne McLaughlin (National Gallery) from the Practical IIIF Project
